com.oa.couponsWebApp

Class DAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.oa.couponsWebApp.DAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBusinessDAO, ICouponsDAO, IUsersDAO

    public class DAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICouponsDAO, IBusinessDAO, IUsersDAO
    class DAO that implements 3 interfaces of: Coupon Business User of every one there is function of add/update/delete as a Singleton
